content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command from the user to google "history of karate". As your computer, I returned a list of 8 websites related to the history of karate.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.britannica.com/sports/karate", "question": "What is the history of karate?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Karate evolved over centuries in East Asia and was systematized in Okinawa in the 17th century by people who were forbidden to carry weapons. It was later imported into Japan in the 1920s. Karate has several schools and systems, each with different techniques and training methods. It emphasizes mental attitude, rituals of courtesy, costumes, and a complex ranking system by belt colour. Karate has some overlapping techniques with other fighting styles. \n \n Links: ['\\n\\n (https://www.britannica.com/)', '\\n                        Dictionary (https://www.britannica.com/dictionary)', '\\n                        Quizzes (https://www.britannica.com/quiz/browse)', '\\n                        Money (https://www.britannica.com/money)', '\\n                        Video (https://www.britannica.com/videos)']"}]
"""
